verses.name: Acts 4:13
verses.text: Now when they saw the boldness of Peter and John, and perceived that they were unlearned and ignorant men, they marvelled; and they took knowledge of them, that they had been with Jesus.

verses.name: Acts 4:14
verses.text: And beholding the man which was healed standing with them, they could say nothing against it.

verses.name: Acts 4:15
verses.text: But when they had commanded them to go aside out of the council, they conferred among themselves,

verses.name: Acts 4:16
verses.text: Saying, What shall we do to these men? for that indeed a notable miracle hath been done by them is manifest to all them that dwell in Jerusalem; and we cannot deny it.
